mapper.sql: check_num, check_name, ward_code, check_person, check_patient_type, check_patient_ward, follow_begin_date, follow_end_date, check_ratio, plan_num, area_code, check_status, check_craeter, create_date
mapper.select:
select
from leanin_follow_check where check_status>=0
and check_name like CONCAT('%',#{checkName},'%')
mapper.update: update leanin_follow_check set check_status=#{status} where check_num = #{checkNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into leanin_follow_check
check_num,
check_name,
ward_code,
check_person,
check_patient_type,
check_patient_ward,
follow_begin_date,
follow_end_date,
check_ratio,
plan_num,
area_code,
check_status,
check_craeter,
create_date,

mapper.update:
update leanin_follow_check
check_name = #{checkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ward_code = #{wardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_person = #{checkPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_patient_type = #{checkPatientType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_patient_ward = #{checkPatientWard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
follow_begin_date = #{followBeginDate,jdbcType=DATE},
follow_end_date = #{followEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
check_ratio = #{checkRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_num = #{planNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where check_num = #{checkNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
